import{GET_DESIGNATIONID,GET_DESIGNATIONID_SUCCESS,GET_EMPLOYEETYPE,GET_EMPLOYEETYPE_SUCCESS,GET_STATE,GET_STATE_SUCCESS,POST_EMPLOYEE_SUCCESS,POST_EMPLOYEE,GET_EMPLOYEE_LIST,GET_EMPLOYEE_LIST_SUCCESS,DELETE_EMPLOYEE_ID,DELETE_EMPLOYEE_ID_SUCCESS,EDIT_EMPLOYEE_ID,EDIT_EMPLOYEE_ID_SUCCESS,UPDATE_EMPLOYEE_ID,UPDATE_EMPLOYEE_ID_SUCCESS,GET_COMPANYNAME_BY_EMPLOYEETYPES_ID,GET_COMPANYNAME_BY_EMPLOYEETYPES_ID_SUCCESS,GET_PARTYNAME_BY_DIVISIONTYPES_ID,GET_PARTYNAME_BY_DIVISIONTYPES_ID_SUCCESS}from"./actionTypes";///DesignationID  dropdown
export var getDesignationID=function getDesignationID(){return{type:GET_DESIGNATIONID};};export var getDesignationIDSuccess=function getDesignationIDSuccess(DesignationID){return{type:GET_DESIGNATIONID_SUCCESS,payload:DesignationID};};///EmployeeType  dropdown
export var getEmployeeType=function getEmployeeType(){return{type:GET_EMPLOYEETYPE};};export var getEmployeeTypeESuccess=function getEmployeeTypeESuccess(EmployeeType){return{type:GET_EMPLOYEETYPE_SUCCESS,payload:EmployeeType};};///State  dropdown
export var getState=function getState(){return{type:GET_STATE};};export var getStateESuccess=function getStateESuccess(State){return{type:GET_STATE_SUCCESS,payload:State};};///post api
export var postEmployee=function postEmployee(Data,id){return{type:POST_EMPLOYEE,Data:Data,id:id};};export var PostEmployeeSuccess=function PostEmployeeSuccess(AddUserMessage){return{type:POST_EMPLOYEE_SUCCESS,payload:AddUserMessage};};/// get Empoyee list 
export var getEmployeelist=function getEmployeelist(){return{type:GET_EMPLOYEE_LIST};};export var getEmployeelistSuccess=function getEmployeelistSuccess(pages){return{type:GET_EMPLOYEE_LIST_SUCCESS,payload:pages};};////delete api
export var delete_Employee_ID=function delete_Employee_ID(id){return{type:DELETE_EMPLOYEE_ID,id:id};};export var deleteEmployeeIDSuccess=function deleteEmployeeIDSuccess(deleteMessage){return{type:DELETE_EMPLOYEE_ID_SUCCESS,payload:deleteMessage};};// edit api
export var editEmployeeeId=function editEmployeeeId(id,pageMode){return{type:EDIT_EMPLOYEE_ID,id:id,pageMode:pageMode};};export var editEmployeeSuccess=function editEmployeeSuccess(editData){return{type:EDIT_EMPLOYEE_ID_SUCCESS,payload:editData};};// update api
export var updateEmployeeID=function updateEmployeeID(updateData,ID){return{type:UPDATE_EMPLOYEE_ID,updateData:updateData,ID:ID};};export var updateEmployeeIDSuccess=function updateEmployeeIDSuccess(updateMessage){return{type:UPDATE_EMPLOYEE_ID_SUCCESS,payload:updateMessage};};// Company Name API dependent on Employee Types api
export var Get_CompanyName_By_EmployeeTypeID=function Get_CompanyName_By_EmployeeTypeID(id){return{type:GET_COMPANYNAME_BY_EMPLOYEETYPES_ID,id:id};};export var Get_CompanyName_By_EmployeeTypeID_Success=function Get_CompanyName_By_EmployeeTypeID_Success(data){return{type:GET_COMPANYNAME_BY_EMPLOYEETYPES_ID_SUCCESS,payload:data};};
